review: My son was cleaning all his guitars after opening this gift on Christmas morning.  I am pleased with this product.
This unique gift put a big smile on the male teen musician in our home and that made me smile.
I am pleased with this guitar strap and feel it will do great for the young musician in our home.
Wow, is what my teenage son said when he opened this on Christmas morning.  He loved the variety & number of picks!
This was a requested gift from my teenage son for Christmas and you should've seen the smile on his face that day.

It was great to get quality Christmas gifts that my son was pleased with. The budding musician in our home was glad to receive this item as we do not have a music store in our town. So thanks to Amazon for making this possible.
